column5: Waiting for pictures from ChrisK...then I'll post a real report....  Had a great time!! Thanks everyone!
OK Cliff, you shouldn't tease like that.... hurry up already
And it looks like spinning gear in the background of that teaser photo???  Mike
Nice looking atlantic....    joking of course...can't wait to see the full report I suspect its going to be another good one
Looks like a big girl there Cliff, glad you guys were able to stay to fish one more day!!!  It was good to see you both  Maureen
I know!!!  I know!!! but I cant spoil the surprise!!
Bly did it again didn't she?
